Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

Konrad Shultz

Head Physiotherapist, Canberra Raiders (NRL)

After meeting strict criteria, the Thermoskin range of heat retainer products have been endorsed â€“ the first and only such range to carry the APA name. We are excited to put our name to such an excellent range of products.

Eddie Farrah

Head Physiotherapist, South Sydney Rabbitohs (NRL)

I believe Thermoskin products are the most supportive and best heat products available. They are an essential part of my medical kit.

Dr Jeffrey Boyle

Senior Physiotherapist, Fremantle Football Club

Thermoskin is an essential component in our return to play rehabilitation.

Alex Kountouris

Senior Physiotherapist, Australian Cricket Team

I believe the Thermoskin products are the best to aid in compression and support after an injury as well as assisting players returning to training from injury.

Albert Alonso

Sports Physiotherapist, Bulldogs Rugby League Club (NRL)
